description.overview: Creativity represents your access to creative flow, self-expression, and ability to bring something new into being.
description.detailed: This meter tracks Venus and Neptune transits to your natal Venus, Neptune, and 5th house (creative self-expression, art, play, joy). Venus brings aesthetic sensitivity and the desire to create beauty. Neptune dissolves creative blocks and opens channels to the muse. When these planets form supportive aspects, creative energy flows naturally and you feel inspired. Challenging aspects create creative blocks, self-doubt, or overwhelming inspiration that's hard to ground. Venus retrograde reduces creative flow by 30%, Neptune by 20%.

primary_planets.venus: Aesthetic sense, desire to create beauty, artistic expression
primary_planets.neptune: Dissolves creative blocks, opens channels to the muse, boundless imagination

key_houses.5: Creative self-expression, art, play, joy, and bringing ideas into form

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum creative impact - inspired flow or overwhelming chaos
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension between vision and execution
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - creativity comes naturally and joyfully
aspect_weights.square: Moderate friction - creative blocks or self-doubt
aspect_weights.sextile: Moderate flow - opportunities for creative expression

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Encouraging and permission-giving - validate creative blocks and celebrate flow
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize making time for creative work, trusting inspiration, letting it flow
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Normalize creative fallow periods, rest is part of the process, input before output
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Validate creative blocks as real - offer concrete strategies (change medium, lower stakes, play)

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Creative energy is flowing today - make time to create, follow your inspiration, and trust what wants to come through you.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: Creative energy is active but takes effort - lower the stakes and focus on process over outcome to keep flow going.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Creative blocks are real today - honor the fallow period, focus on input (reading, observing) rather than forcing output.
